you must stop its bleeding first through a clean cloth if its bleeding

patterns: there is overpopulation of dogs in my society
responses: Get in touch with the MCD or MCG who will forward the request to NGOs for sterilisation. Just make sure to have a dog-friendly person involved to make the process easier for dogs

patterns: a dog bit me what should i do
responses:
1)If the skin is not broken - wash the area with warm water and soap and you can apply a antiseptic solution to the area.
2)If the skin is broken by not bleeding - clean the area using warm water, soap and a clean towel. Press the surrounding area to bleeding. This will help in removing the germs. Clean the blood and apply an antibacterial ointment.
3)If the wound is bleeding - apply and press a clean cloth to the area to stop bleeding. Clean the area and apply a sterile bandage.

patterns: want to report about an incident regarding dog violence
responses: You can visit the website of MCD and file the complaint on line with regard to the stray dog. You will be allotted a complaint number and the complaint would be addressed in the given time frame.

patterns: person abused a dog in my society
responses:
1)Gather as much evidence as you can.
2)Shoot an e-mail to police and NGOâ€™s in your area. They have to take an action on this.
3)Mostly police try to not file FIR because it is a work for them so you have to take help of PFA or a good NGO.

patterns: how can i help a stray dog
responses:
1)Identify the dogs incapable of surviving on their own.
2)Contact an animal shelter or a community dog center.
3)Arrange for some food.
4)Find a temporary shelter for them.
5)Take care and wait for professional help.

patterns: i found an abandoned dog near my society
Me and my friends found a lost dog
responses:
1)Secure the dog and inform a community dog centre.
2)Click a picture of the dog and circulate it on social media and community social groups.
3)Ensure that food and water are given to the dog.
4)Arrange for a temporary shelter.
5)If anyone claims of ownership verify thoroughly.
6)If no one contacts or claims for ownership you can adopt the dog. If interested.

patterns: how to build shelter for stray dogs
where can i build shelter for stray dogs
responses:
1)You cannot emphasize enough on making sure its on high ground. Else use cement bricks or boards to raise the level.
2)Use simple rolls of fibreglass. You can get them at any hardware store for a few hundred Rs or less. Just staple them into a large cylinder then use wide tape to seal it.
3)Put some old sheets at the bottom and the pups will love it. They will snuggle around it.
God bless.

patterns: is it ok to touch a stray dog
is it okay to touch stray dogs
is it okay to play with stray dogs
can i touch a stray dog
can i play with street dogs
responses: Yes it is totally safe to touch and play with stray dogs.

patterns: how to tell a stray dogs behaviour
how to tell stray dog behavior
how can i tell the behaviour of stray dog by seeing it
responses:
1)Wagging tail means dog is happy or it lokes you. In this case go forward and simply touch it. Do not hug though. It is a sign of dominance.
 2)Straight tail pointing out means suspicious. In this case avoid unnecessary eye contact. Always approach an unkown dog from sideways and do not touch its head.
3)Tail between the legs means afraid. Sit down and extend your hand. If it comes forward move slowly and touch on the neck or behind the ear. Avoid quick movements.

patterns: how can i find the closest vet near me
responses: Just ask Zeus 'nearby vet' and he'll help you

patterns: i found a dog whos leg is fractured
found a dog who has fractured bone
responses:
1)First thing to notice is if she is limping. Limping or not putting any weight on hurt leg means a bone damage as compared to muscle/skin damage.
 2)If she is limping heavily, try to make it so that she does not have to move around much.
3)If bone is broken, every step will cause further damage.
4)If she is docile and there is no danger of her biting you, inspect leg for open wound.
5)You should apply 'himax' cream on wound after cleaning with hydrogen peroxide as it is one the few creams that dogs do not lick off.

 Warning - Do not give any human medicine or painkillers.
